Package ntnu.idatt2106.group8.gidd.service

Class AccountService

java.lang.Object
ntnu.idatt2106.group8.gidd.service.AccountService
@Service
public class AccountService
extends java.lang.Object
Service class which contains Account-related business logic.

      public AccountService()

  • Method Details

    • findAll

      public java.util.List<Account> findAll()
      Returns a collection of all accounts registered with Gidd
      Returns:
      a collection of all accounts registered with Gidd

    • save

      public boolean save​(Account account)
      Registers a new account with Gidd. The account must have a unique email address, i.e. one which is not associated with an already registered account
      Parameters:
      account - the new account to register with Gidd.
      Returns:
      true if the account was registered, false if an account with the given email already exists.

    • saveAccountWithInfo

      public boolean saveAccountWithInfo​(Account account, AccountInfo accountInfo)
      Saves a new account to the database along with its account information.
      Parameters:
      account - the new account to save in the database.
      accountInfo - the info of the new account.

    • login

      public JWTResponse login​(AuthRequest authRequest, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws java.lang.Exception
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • isValidToken

      public boolean isValidToken​(java.lang.String jwtToken)

    • findByEmail

      public Account findByEmail​(java.lang.String email)
      Returns the account which is registered at Gidd with the given email address, or null if no account with the given email exists.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address of the account to search for
      Returns:
      the account registered with the given email address, or null if no match was found.

    • deleteAccount

      public void deleteAccount​(int id)
      Deletes the account with the given id from the database. If no account with the given id exits, then nothing happens.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the account to delete.

    • updateAccount

      public Account updateAccount​(int id, Account account)
      Updates the given account
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the account (not used)
      account - the account data to save
      Returns:
      the account that was updated

    • findAccountInfo

      public AccountInfo findAccountInfo​(int id)
      Returns the account information of the account with the given id, or null if no account registered with Gidd has the given id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the account to find the info of.
      Returns:
      the AccountInfo of the account with the given id, or null if the id does not identify a registered account.

    • updateAccountEmail

      public void updateAccountEmail​(int id, java.lang.String email)
      Changes the email address of the account with the given id to the given email. If the given Id does not identify a registerd account, then nothing happens.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the account that should change email.
      email - the new email of the account.

    • updateAccountPassword

      public boolean updateAccountPassword​(int id, java.lang.String password)
      Changes the current password of the account with the given id to the given password. Returns true if an account with the given id exists (and the password was changed). Returns false if no account with the given id exists (and the password was not changed).
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the account that should change password.
      password - the new password of the account.
      Returns:
      true if the id corresponds to an existing account, false if otherwise

    • findAccountByResetSuffix

      public Account findAccountByResetSuffix​(java.lang.String resetSuffix)
      Finds and returns a account that is linked to a current reset token.
      Parameters:
      resetSuffix - the reset suffix key linked to the account.
      Returns:
      a account with null as email if it was not found. otherwise the account linked to the suffix.

    • resetAccountPassword

      public boolean resetAccountPassword​(java.lang.String urlSuffix, java.lang.String newPassword)
      Resets the password for a account in the database provided the given suffix is valid.
      Parameters:
      urlSuffix - a valid suffix to reset a accounts password.
      newPassword - the new password to the account.
      Returns:

    • generatePasswordReset

      public void generatePasswordReset​(java.lang.String mailToReset)
      Sends a password reset link to the provided mail address if it exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      mailToReset - the mail to reset the password to.

    • findAccountById

      public Account findAccountById​(int accountId)
      Finds a account in the database and returns it.
      Parameters:
      accountId - the id of the account to look up.
      Returns:
      a Account with the given id, null if none were found.

    • findAccountByCredentials

      public Account findAccountByCredentials​(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password)
      Finds a account that matches the provided email and password.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the account to search for.
      password - the password of the account to search for.
      Returns:
      a Account-object that matches the given credentials. Null if no account were found.

    • accountExistsById

      public boolean accountExistsById​(int accountID)
      Checks if the database contains a account with a given id.
      Parameters:
      accountID - the id of the account.
      Returns:
      true if the account exists in the database, false if not.

    • accountExistByCredentials

      public boolean accountExistByCredentials​(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password)
      Checks if the database contains a account with a given id.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the account.
      password - the password of the account.
      Returns:
      true if the account exists in the database, false if not.

    • removeAccountFromActivity

      public boolean removeAccountFromActivity​(int activityId, int accountId)
      Removes the binding between a account and a activity, while decrementing the queue position of the accounts above in queue (if any).
      Parameters:
      activityId - the id of the activity to remove the binding from the account to.
      accountId - the id of the account to remove the binding from the activity from.

    • addAccountToActivity

      public boolean addAccountToActivity​(int activityId, int accountId)
      Binds a given account to a given activity. If there is space in the activity the account is immediately bound to the activity. Otherwise the account is put to the back of the queue.
      Parameters:
      activityId - the id of the activity to add the account to.
      accountId - the id of the account to add to the activity.
      Returns:
      true if the account was queued, false if not.

    • findAccountActivity

      public AccountActivity findAccountActivity​(int accountId, int activityId)
      Gets a specific account-activity binding from the database.
      Parameters:
      activityId - the id of the activity that is bound to a account.
      accountId - the id of the account that is bound to a activity.
      Returns:
      null if no account-activity matching the given parameters was found.

    • findAccountsActivities

      public java.util.Set<Activity> findAccountsActivities​(int accountID)
      Getter for all activities a account is related to.
      Parameters:
      accountID - the id of the account to find the activities for.
      Returns:
      a empty set if no activities was found for the given user, otherwise a set with the activities.

    • findAccountsCreatedActivities

      public java.util.Set<Activity> findAccountsCreatedActivities​(int accountId)
      Getter for all the activities created by a user in the database.
      Parameters:
      accountId - the id of the account to find the created activities of.
      Returns:
      a set containing the activities that has the given account as creator.

    • saveAccountInfoToAccount

      public boolean saveAccountInfoToAccount​(AccountInfo accountInfo, int id)
      Method for updating the AccountInfo for a specific Account
      Parameters:
      accountInfo - the updated AccountInfo
      id - the id of the Account with the AccountInfo
      Returns:
      true or false
